imdb.plot outline: This second year of the acclaimed Screenwriters' Lecture Series, in association with The JJ Charitable Trust, saw Nicholson, Moira Buffini (Tamara Drewe), John Logan (The Aviator), Guillermo Arriaga (Amores Perros), Frank Cottrell Boyce (24 Hour Party People), Paul Laverty (My Name Is Joe) and Charlie Kaufman (Being John Malkovich) share their insights on the art of screenwriting.
imdb.title: Screenwriters: The BAFTA and BFI Lecture Series
akas: Screenwriters: The BAFTA and BFI Lecture Series (United Kingdom)
plot: This second year of the acclaimed Screenwriters' Lecture Series, in association with The JJ Charitable Trust, saw Nicholson, Moira Buffini (Tamara Drewe), John Logan (The Aviator), Guillermo Arriaga (Amores Perros), Frank Cottrell Boyce (24 Hour Party People), Paul Laverty (My Name Is Joe) and Charlie Kaufman (Being John Malkovich) share their insights on the art of screenwriting.::BAFTA
